greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A000139(n) mod 2; Characteristic function of odd fibbinary numbers (A022341).
comment: Equals 1 if and only if the binary expansion of n does not contain two 1's in consecutive positions and ends in a 1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
M. Elder and V. Vatter, Problems and Conjectures presented at the Third International Conference on Permutation Patterns, University of Florida, March 7-11, 2005, arXiv:math/0505504 [math.CO], 2005.
results.author: _Colin Defant_, Mar 21 2019
ext: Secondary name and more terms added by _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 22 2019
